channel.title: Item gives points?
channel.description: im using a 718 and im trying to make 1 item give like maybe 20 pk points? how can i make so one item can give you a pk point for like an example how they did the thing with the squeal of fortune ticket, if you clicked on it, it would give you 1 free spin, something like that! -thanks

item.title: Item gives points?
item.dc:creator: @Devinhdl Devinhdl
item.description:
@Devinhdl wrote:

I’ve never worked with anything higher than a 508 (even with a 508 I barely know anything), but since you already have an example of something that works (ex: squeal of fortune), use the code that is used with your example and modify it to your needs…

this would be for a 317, inside clickitem.java:

case ITEMID: //can have multiple IDs perform the same action this way case ITEMID: //item id that you are using c.pkPoints += 20; // adds 20 pk points to the existing amount of pk points break; //breaks out of this case

note that I just made this off of the fly

Read full topic
